title: 2nd fl - 2br, 1 bath, free furniture/appliance, pay own elec/gas/heat
posting_body: ['2nd floor 2 BR apartment with access to front and back stairways.', 'Living room has ceiling fans, free sofa & tv stand.', 'Main bedroom will fit queen/full bed, has long closet & ceiling fan', "Small child's bedroom will fit one twin bed set or a small office.", 'Bathroom has 4 leg claw-tub, vanity, toilet, medicine cabinet,', 'Kitchen has free stove/fridge, table for 4, some kitchen supplies.', 'Rent $750/mo, Deposit $750, pay own electric, gas, heat, own a/c', 'Ideal for 1 adult + 1 small child.', '   Absolutely No Dog & No Drugs.', 'Must have $2750 monthly income, able to show last 3 mo paystubs.', 'Require Full Rent + Full Deposit + turn Nipsco on before moving in.', 'Available NOW, Text or Call 219-716-4484 for appointment.', ' No Fee,']
